name: @touchspin/standalone
description: Standalone TouchSpin adapter (core + renderer bundles with mount API)

scripts.build: yarn run build:deps && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/umd && yarn run build:types && yarn run build:js
scripts.build:js: tsup src/index.ts src/bootstrap3.ts src/bootstrap4.ts src/bootstrap5.ts src/tailwind.ts src/vanilla.ts --format esm --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:test: yarn run build:deps:test && tsc -p tsconfig.testbuild.json && tsup src/bootstrap3.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinStandaloneBootstrap3 --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/standalone/umd --external=none && tsup src/bootstrap4.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinStandaloneBootstrap4 --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/standalone/umd --external=none && tsup src/bootstrap5.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinStandaloneBootstrap5 --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/standalone/umd --external=none && tsup src/tailwind.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinStandaloneTailwind --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/standalone/umd --external=none && tsup src/vanilla.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinStandaloneVanilla --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/standalone/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/write-artifacts-manifest.mjs --dir ../../../devdist/adapters/standalone esmEntry=index.js umdBs3Entry=umd/bootstrap3.global.js umdBs4Entry=umd/bootstrap4.global.js umdBs5Entry=umd/bootstrap5.global.js umdTailwindEntry=umd/tailwind.global.js umdVanillaEntry=umd/vanilla.global.js
scripts.watch: tsup src/index.ts src/bootstrap3.ts src/bootstrap4.ts src/bootstrap5.ts src/tailwind.ts src/vanilla.ts --format esm --watch --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json
scripts.test: node ../../../scripts/pre-test.mjs packages/adapters/standalone/tests && cd ../../.. && playwright test packages/adapters/standalone/tests/

author: TouchSpin Contributors
